name: Bralani Wintersoul
text: Nobility to the eladrin people is more than statusâ€”it is an investiture of power granted by the archfey in exchange for binding oaths and devotion. The eladrin refer to their nobles by many titles, and one traveling in their circles is bound to encounter coure, novier, firre, and others. Each title reflects a particular pact and the magical power gained as a result. The bralani are eladrin nobles who bind themselves to those archfey associated with nature, the seasons, and storms. The power they wield allows them to harness elements and make them their own.

features.winter'sTouch(11thLevel): When a cold attack hits you, your melee and ranged attacks deal extra cold damage equal to your Dexterity modifier or your Intelligence modifier until the end of your next turn
features.wintersoulFlurryAction(11thLevel): When you spend an action point to make an attack, you create a zone of flurrying snow in a close burst 5 that lasts until the end of your next turn
features.icyPresence(16thLevel): Any enemy that starts its turn in a square adjacent to you is slowed until the end of its turn

flavorText: I am the winter storm, the screaming blizzard, and the blinding snow.
